description:
Get the #1 rated and ranked Bible App for FREE. The Bible App makes it easy to read and share God's Word, with almost 300 free Bible versions and 200+ reading plans that help you read the Bible and track your progress. The Bible App even reads to you with audio Bibles! No in-app purchases – everything is free.

MANY GREAT BIBLE VERSIONS:

Free access to many modern English Bible versions including the NIV, ESV, NLT, NKJV, AMP, NASB, CEV, NET, WEB, NCV, TNIV, HCSB, The Message and more.

Free access to Bibles in many other languages including German, French, Italian, Chinese Simplified and Traditional, Swedish, Korean, Japanese, Norwegian, Czech, Bulgarian, Dutch, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian and more.

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Search: Easily search the Bible for either a reference or a keyword.

Plans: Choose from more than 230 daily reading plans, divided into several categories to help you read the Bible consistently. Track your Bible reading progress and sync your changes back to YouVersion.com.

Sharing: Connect your Twitter and Facebook accounts to easily share Bible verses.

Bookmarks: Bookmark and label your favorite Bible verses and sync them with YouVersion.com.

Notes: Make public or private notes on your Bible reading. Your notes sync with YouVersion.com. View public notes from other Bible App users.

Live: Interact with churches and services around you. Take notes, respond to polls, answer questions, tweet about the event, and more!

COMING SOON
More daily Bible reading plans

More social integration with YouVersion.com

We do not sell or share any personal information that you provide us with third parties. You can read our privacy policy at youversion.com/privacy.
